channel.title: How do I make the ::setitem an auto ipban?
channel.description: I want to make it so if a player uses the ::setitem command its an auto ip ban so I can fix the smithing dupe. Can anyone help me here? Or supply the code please

item.title: How do I make the ::setitem an auto ipban?
item.dc:creator: @The_Reaper_X The Reaper X
item.description:
@The_Reaper_X wrote:

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“setitem”) && playerRights !=3) {
disconnect = true;
appendToBanned;
}

That’s for if you want the requirements to be player rights of 3. change it to !playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“The Reaper X”)) if yo want a name requirement. obviously you’re going to use your name not mine.

Basically it’s saying, if you don’t have (dont is !) playerRights of 3 or you don’t have the name The Reaper X, you’re append to the banned list.

Read full topic
item.source: How do I make the ::setitem an auto ipban?
